mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.faclt_nm, c.first_image_url, (SELECT ROUND(AVG((campRateCleanliness + campRatePrice + campRateFacility) / 3), 1) FROM campRate WHERE contentId = camp_site.content_id GROUP BY contentId) as campSiteScore FROM campLike l, camp_site c WHERE l.contentId = c.content_id AND userNo = #{userNo};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM campLike WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND contentId = #{contentId};
